mapper.update: update exchange_account_detail set coin = #{coin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, biz_code = #{bizCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, biz_time = #{bizTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, biz_seq_no = #{bizSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_income = #{isIncome,jdbcType=BIT}, item = #{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, volume = #{volume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, coin, biz_code, biz_time, biz_seq_no, is_income, item, volume, create_time from exchange_account_detail
